评论详情: I'm very glad for your advice to order a larger size, I did and was very pleased on my cruise because I received a lot of compliments on it. It's amazing.

I ordered this for a costume. It's actually decent quality and pretty cool. However I couldn't even get it zipped.  I'm usually a size 4 and have wide hips with a small waist. Exchanging the medium for a large

Love love the style, how’s it’s not pure black and has a slightly darker design to it. I got many head turns, and I would buy again and again. It was easy enough to walk in as well, I walked through nyc for 5 hrs and never felt restricted, although of course for stairs I had to raise up the skirt so I wouldn’t trip, but it wasn’t difficult to do so at all.
Did not come with lace from picture.

This skirt requires at least two people to zip it but once it's up it's up! very sexy doesn't even drag on the ground I'm 5'1" and ordered a small it fit around my waist but as mentioned the zipper is a beast so as long as you have help you should be fine!
Pretty material.  Comfortable for walking. Long.

评论概述: I’m short this skirt is soooo long comes up way past my belly button.
评论详情: I am 5 ft 1 I didn’t expect the skirt to be almost as tall as me. But it fits me to a T width wise. It’s a beautiful skirt really! Definitely made for taller women 😂

This was very comfortable it’s a little see through but I just wore shorts underneath and it does take a minute to tie the laces asides from that beautiful piece I was given compliments all night and asked where I bought it
